#summary Editor color drawers

== Introduction ==

The module provides editor color drawers:

 * "Current word" - It highlights occurrences of the current word in the editor.
 * "Fixed column" - It highlights the fixed column (80th by default).

See [http://farnet.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Drawer/About-Drawer.text About-Drawer.text] for the details.
